item.title: How Can You Cope With Big Data?
item.description: The sheer size of “Big Data” is a popular topic, but what does it really mean? Does the thought of managing massive amounts of data feel overwhelming, or do you see it as an opportunity? Ensuring you have the right infrastructure and connectivity is essential. Discover the cloud and connection services tailored for your business’s location.

item.title: Types of Bandwidth for Wide Area Networks
item.description: Wide Area Networks (WANs) connect your business to the outside world, encompassing private networks across various locations. These connections, often called “long haul circuits”, form the foundation of wide area networking. Connecting your local area network (LAN) to a WAN usually involves a router and a specialized interface corresponding to the WAN circuit type. A common WAN connection is a T1 line, terminating at a “smart jack” in your telecom closet.
